value_i18n.ar_SA: * All prices are in USD. For regional based pricing, please reach out to your Channel Account Manager. Please note: The information provided on pricing is for your reference only. Quotes can not be shared with clients until an Liferay account representative provides official pricing on an approved deal registration.

value_i18n.ar_SA: Liferay's approach is SaaS first. This pricing model supports endless solutions on Liferay SaaS on three plans by different levels of capabilities: Pro, Business and Enterprise. With each of these models, it is essential to include a MALU Band and an APV band. Click here to learn more about how to calculate MALU and APV bands.

value_i18n.ar_SA: In the cases where, for a valid reason, Liferay SaaS offering is not appropriate for a prospect, but where Cloud is acceptable, Liferay PaaS offering could be the deployment option to offer. With Liferay PaaS, Liferay provides DXP with all of its capabilities included, and as of DXP 7.4 that also includes Commerce and Analytics capabilities.

value_i18n.ar_SA: The Liferay Self-Hosted model is Plan based, providing a bundle of Instances and Environments. Sometimes Cloud, in either SaaS or PaaS-mode is not an option for a Customer. With Liferay Self-Hosted, Liferay provides just the DXP software itself, with the Customer responsible for everything else, either doing it themselves or paying for someone else to do it.
